0.evidence: Best hits to Demospongiae sequences, ~93% identity

1.evidence: Top representatives matched to uncultured Alveolate sequences with 85–90% identity

2.evidence: Best hits to environmental Ascomycota sequences, 92–95% identity

3.evidence: No strong matches (>85%) in BLAST, possible novel lineage

4.evidence: Moderate matches to Ciliate sequences, 88–92% identity

5.evidence: Representatives aligned to green algae sequences, 90–95% identity

6.evidence: 3 representatives top BLAST hits to Homo sapiens, pident ~99%, coverage ~100%

7.evidence: Top hits to polychaete worms (marine annelids), 90–93% identity

8.annotation: Novel Protist — low similarity to reference
8.evidence: Best hits below 80% identity, possibly novel protist group

9.evidence: Matches to uncultured dinoflagellate clones, 92% identity
